name: Bot MD
headline: AI Clinical Assistant for Doctors
description: Bot MD is an A.I assistant for doctors. Our company's mission is to Empower Doctors around the world. Bot MD can be trained on any type of hospital content to provide instant answers to clinical questions.

founders.name: Dorothea Koh, Founder/Founding CEO
founders.description: Moon walker. Passionate about impacting healthcare in large emerging markets.

founders.name: Yanchuan Sim, Founder/CTO
founders.description: Former scientist in NLP/ML. Currently building chatbots at Bot MD.

# Hello ðŸ˜ŽðŸ‘‹ We're Bot MD. ‍**We empower doctors by automating their manual workflows so they can focus on patient care.**
Our AI-powered patient engagement platform integrates with your existing hospital or clinic information systems (yes even the EMR!) to help you automate appointment scheduling, reminders, remote monitoring, information search and more.
[OUR PRODUCTS](https://www.botmd.io/<#Our-Products>)
[SCHEDULE DEMO](https://www.botmd.io/</en/schedule-demo>)

## Our Products
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/61fcfa674b8319e957cca4a3/623161dd9ea18ab6055bcf27_Care.png)
AI-powered Patient Engagement
## **Bot MD Care**
Say goodbye to paper forms and manual phone calls. Bot MD automates your clinical workflows and improves patient engagement through popular chat apps like WhatsApp, Viber and LINE. ‍Automate follow-up reminders, patient registration, appointment scheduling, patient education and remote monitoring at scale without added workload.
[Learn more about Bot MD Care ->](https://www.botmd.io/</en/care>)
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/61fcfa674b8319e957cca4a3/62301639b2cf9e56a8219acb_Hospital.png)
AI Search for DOCTORS & NURSES
## **Bot MD Hospital**
Instantly search all your hospital information within a single chat interface. Bot MD integrates with your intranet, EMR and your hospital information systems (even Excel sheets!) to directly respond to your questions.Ask about guidelines, call rosters, drug formulary and more. It's like having the Hospital Operator in your pocket, 24/7.
[Learn more about Bot MD Hospital ->](https://www.botmd.io/</en/hospital>)
## Our Use Cases
[Get in touch](https://www.botmd.io/</en/schedule-demo>)
[![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/61fcfa674b831967bccca4ab/67767b7ad4a438e5cc3ba93a_monitoring%20hero%20image.webp)Remote Patient MonitoringEmpower patients to manage their health from home with seamless monitoring and personalized reminders for follow-ups, medications, and daily care.](https://www.botmd.io/</en/use-cases/remote-patient-monitoring>)
[![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/61fcfa674b831967bccca4ab/67725b6cf902af00313aa5fd_67481fc63245ba4315bce674_03b060fe-de90-4c2b-98b1-f51feb1f2268.webp)PROM/PREMs CollectionCapture meaningful patient-reported outcome and experience measures (PROMs/PREMs) with ease, gaining valuable insights to continuously improve care quality.](https://www.botmd.io/</en/use-cases/prom-prems-collection>)
[![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/61fcfa674b831967bccca4ab/67725a6deac8c04349fc46f6_67481ec9fba593c4654d5a1a_64f6f186-263f-4270-a00d-92105e2f578f.webp)Appointment SchedulingKeep your practice efficient and your patients engaged with automated appointment and follow-up reminders that drive higher visit rates.](https://www.botmd.io/</en/use-cases/appointment-scheduling>)
[![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/61fcfa674b831967bccca4ab/6772590f032c7726def266cc_67481f0717727ff8b2615ce5_a92ddc94-d9f8-4bad-8e1e-3a1798a964e8.webp)Patient Education/JourneyAutomate education and engagement with a patient engagement chatbot, keeping patients informed and supported throughout their healthcare journey.](https://www.botmd.io/</en/use-cases/patient-education-journey>)
[![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/61fcfa674b831967bccca4ab/67725780f8affcba7a4bedba_67481f9de73d63845e6fd596_5c4488a6-25bd-406a-9848-6172aa682011.webp)Patient Marketing & EngagementEnhance your reach and patient engagement with Bot MDâ€™s automated marketing solutions, driving higher retention and patient loyalty.](https://www.botmd.io/</en/use-cases/patient-marketing-engagement>)
[![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/61fcfa674b831967bccca4ab/6772554ef1625bc0d602c0c9_67482b3981d13928a22af83a_94ce4204-e437-4ce0-ba8b-f76a3f82960c.webp)Pre-/Post Visit Data CollectionImprove the efficiency and quality of consultations with pre-visit and post-visit data collection, empowering patients to share relevant information and feedback.](https://www.botmd.io/</en/use-cases/pre-post-visit-data-collection>)
[![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/61fcfa674b831967bccca4ab/677252c03cedf4ffe0216691_674981f44cac16c934609f31_617bd194-f1de-42e6-8d0f-a42771e65245.webp)Automated Follow-upEnsure consistent patient follow-up with Bot MDâ€™s automated tools, helping patients stay on track with their care plans and improving long-term outcomes.](https://www.botmd.io/</en/use-cases/automated-follow-up>)
[![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/61fcfa674b831967bccca4ab/677250c8dc11ff1907da263a_67498401b6a0da37986335f5_feb112bd-4dac-49b5-a362-c93ff2e065f7.webp)Handling Patient InquiriesRespond to patient inquiries quickly and effectively with Bot MDâ€™s AI-powered solutions, reducing response times and improving patient satisfaction.](https://www.botmd.io/</en/use-cases/handling-patient-inquiries>)
[![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/61fcfa674b831967bccca4ab/67724e5300a188077bceae0b_67481e435fa505c7faaffe47_hypertension_13.jpg)Chronic Disease ManagementSupport patients with chronic conditions through continuous monitoring and tailored interventions, empowering them to stay on top of their health.](https://www.botmd.io/</en/use-cases/chronic-disease-management>)

Dr **Romina A. Danguilan**
Deputy Executive Director, Medical Services, National Kidney and Transplant Institute
### "Bot MD Care allows us to remotely monitor these patients using A.I. to triage their submissions so we can detect early stage infections and intervene quickly through teleconsultations or calls."
[Read more](https://www.botmd.io/</en/news/nkti>)
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/61fcfa674b8319e957cca4a3/62301692404861a3d8d02416_samuel_ow_88.png)
Dr Samuel Ow
Oncologist, National University Cancer Institute
### "Bot MD Care allows us to reach out to patients early, and provide targeted education so that they come for their consultation better-informed and ready to decide on the next step."
[Read more](https://www.botmd.io/</en/news/angie>)
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/61fcfa674b8319e957cca4a3/66cd1e87d74f348d10ea6e2d_andrew-chou-chia-chen-portrait.jpg)
Dr Andrew Chou
Orthopedic Surgeon, KK Women's & Children's Hospital
### "Bot MD automates away the manual and tedious parts of our clinical workflows so that doctors like myself can devote time to actually caring for patients."
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/61fcfa674b8319e957cca4a3/623016924048611f73d02418_yy.png)
Dr Yih Yng Ng
ER Physician, Tan Tock Seng Hospital
### "Before Bot MD Hospital, ECG alerts required a dedicated mobile phone that had to be passed between doctor to doctor on every shift. Now the alerts simply go to the right person who needs to see it."

CEO, Parkway Radiology, IHH Healthcare

## Our Products
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/61fcfa674b8319e957cca4a3/623161dd9ea18ab6055bcf27_Care.png)
AI-powered Patient Engagement
## **Bot MD Care**
Say goodbye to paper forms and manual phone calls. Bot MD automates your clinical workflows and improves patient engagement through popular chat apps like WhatsApp, Viber and LINE. ‍Automate follow-up reminders, patient registration, appointment scheduling, patient education and remote monitoring at scale without added workload.
Learn more about Bot MD Care ->âŸ¨2âŸ©
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/61fcfa674b8319e957cca4a3/62301639b2cf9e56a8219acb_Hospital.png)
AI Search for DOCTORS & NURSES
## **Bot MD Hospital**
Instantly search all your hospital information within a single chat interface. Bot MD integrates with your intranet, EMR and your hospital information systems (even Excel sheets!) to directly respond to your questions.Ask about guidelines, call rosters, drug formulary and more. It's like having the Hospital Operator in your pocket, 24/7.
Learn more about Bot MD Hospital ->âŸ¨8âŸ©

generated_description:
**Bot MD: The AI Clinical Assistant Transforming Healthcare**

**Mission**: At Bot MD, our primary goal is straightforward yet powerful: empower doctors globally with advanced AI assistance. We help healthcare professionals access the critical information they need, whenever they need it.

**Overview**: Founded in 2018 and recognized in the Y Combinator Batch S18, Bot MD started its journey in Singapore with an ambitious mission. Our AI clinical assistant can be trained on any hospital content, providing doctors with instant responses to their clinical inquiries. This allows them to focus more on patient care rather than getting bogged down by administrative tasks.

**Team and Impact**: With a dedicated team of 15 employees, we have accomplished a lot in a short time, currently aiding over 20,000 doctors and nurses in their daily operations. This global reach isnâ€™t just a number; it translates to real-world impact for healthcare providers and their patients alike.

**What We Do**: Our platform integrates seamlessly with existing hospital information systems (even EMRs!). We automate key workflows such as:
- **Appointment Scheduling & Reminders**: Reducing no-shows and ensuring patients stay on track.
- **Remote Patient Monitoring**: Helping patients manage their health from home effectively.
- **Patient Engagement**: Providing education and reminders through popular chat platforms like WhatsApp and Viber.

**Products and Solutions**:
1. **Bot MD Care**: Automates clinical workflows and enhances patient engagement.
2. **Bot MD Hospital**: Serves as an AI-powered search tool that allows doctors to retrieve hospital information instantly.
3. **Various Use Cases**: We cater to public and private hospitals, clinics, and Pharma/MedTech industries, addressing needs ranging from chronic disease management to handling patient inquiries.

**Why Choose Bot MD?**: The healthcare landscape is evolving, and efficiency is key. By integrating AI, we not only enhance productivity but also improve patient experiences, allowing healthcare professionals to dedicate more time to what truly matters: patient care.

To explore how Bot MD can transform your healthcare experience, visit us at [botmd.io](https://www.botmd.io) and consider scheduling a demo. Weâ€™re here to revolutionize the way healthcare operates, one doctor at a time.
